text: Aap ney farmaya! Iss ka apni dunbiyon kay sath teri aik dunbi mila lenay ka sawal be-shak teray upper aik zulm hai aur aksar hissay daar aur shareek (aisay hi hotay hain kay) aik doosray per zulm kertay hain siwaye unn kay jo eman laye aur jinhon ney nek amal kiyey aur aisay log boht hi kum hain aur (hazrat) dawwod (alh-e-salam) samajh gaye kay hum ney unhen aazmaya hai phir to apnay rab say istaghfaar kerney lagay aur aajzi kertay huyey gir paray aur (poori tarah) rujoo kiya
